title: What are some business ideas in the education sector? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are numerous ideas depending on your skills, your budget, the sector in which you want to teach and your popularity as a teacher. I am telling with increasing order of budget, skills and popularity:- on your own youtube channel, private tutions quora, private school/institutions, On paid websites like chegg, clarity, unacadamy etc on paid applications like linkedin learning, udemy, youtube kids, byju`s etc. If you develop and improve your skills side by side, than with help of a consultant you can make your personal brand. This way you can now charge more. After attaining much of wealth, you can go for bigger institutes for yourself. This takes time. Other shorter process requires lesser time but little more money. Contact me if you want to discuss about that also.

Hello there, Am not an expert on this. Buy id like to share some thing from my friends family. My friends aunt was working in a garments factory for quiet some time and all of a sudden she started a play home for kids for working couples . She took a place approximately 750 sqft paying some advance negotiating on the rent for 40k brought some toys for 25k (one time investment)and hired 2 caretaker for 7k per month and she usually charges around 3500per kid per month and she has around 35 kids. She easily makes around 45–50k every month. Note: extra careful with kids, requires lot of patience, only women can do it(above 40yrsas they hv experience with kids love and caring mother's) work time can be amazingly fun with kids, not more than six hrs so you can concentrate on you family too.
